abstract: James B Stewart Common Sense column contends it is up to Italian Prime Min Silvio Berlusconi to keep his nation from becoming another Greece and plunging the world into an even more devastating financial crisis; opines his track record does not offer much encouragement, however.
snippet: It is up to Silvio Berlusconi to keep Italy from becoming another Greece and plunging the world into an even more devastating financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: It is up to Silvio Berlusconi to keep Italy from becoming another Greece and plunging the world into an even more devastating financial crisis.

headline.main: A Spotlight Now Shines on Italy
headline.seo: The Spotlight Now Shines on Italy - Common Sense
